## Checklist
<!-- For new dataset contributions -->
- [ ] I have verified the dataset is publicly available
- [ ] I have confirmed the license allows redistribution/listing
- [ ] I have tested the download links
- [ ] I have reviewed existing datasets to avoid duplicates
- [ ] I have provided all required metadata above
